mapper.select: select sum( case when isnull( sex ) and isnull( wx_gender ) and isnull( ali_gender ) then 1 else 0 end ) sex_unknown_sum, sum( case when sex = 1 or (sex is null and wx_gender = 1) or (sex is null and ali_gender = 1) then 1 else 0 end ) sex_male_sum, sum( case when sex = 2 or (sex is null and wx_gender = 2) or (sex is null and ali_gender = 2) then 1 else 0 end ) sex_female_sum, sum( case when isnull( birthday ) then 1 else 0 end ) age_unknown_sum, sum( case when timestampdiff( year, birthday, curdate() ) < 17 then 1 else 0 end ) age_below17_sum, sum( case when timestampdiff( year, birthday, curdate() ) between 17 and 24 then 1 else 0 end ) age18_to24_sum, sum( case when timestampdiff( year, birthday, curdate() ) between 25 and 29 then 1 else 0 end ) age25_to29_sum, sum( case when timestampdiff( year, birthday, curdate() ) between 30 and 39 then 1 else 0 end ) age30_to39_sum, sum( case when timestampdiff( year, birthday, curdate() ) between 40 and 49 then 1 else 0 end ) age40_to49_sum, sum( case when timestampdiff( year, birthday, curdate() ) > 50 then 1 else 0 end ) age_above50_sum from ( select * from member_event_log ${ew.customSqlSegment} ) member_event_log left join member_info member_info on member_event_log.member_id = member_info.id where member_info.id is not null
